FuncDef: The display patch-information ap-id command displays patch information on a specified AP.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays patch information on a specified AP.
The value is an integer ranging from 1024 to 8191.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view patch information on an AP, run the display patch-information ap-id command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
